Table	Create Table
email_workflows	CREATE TABLE `email_workflows` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `triggerType` enum('cohort_join','date_based','manual','enrollment','completion') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `triggerConfig` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `workflowData` json NOT NULL,
  `isActive` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `schedule` json DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=60001
